metadata.title: CVE-2021-3482 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Exiv2 in versions before and including 0.27.4-RC1. Improper input validation of the rawData.size property in Jp2Image::readMetadata() in jp2image.cpp can lead to a heap-based buffer overflow via a crafted JPG image containing malicious EXIF data.

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.27.3-3ubuntu1.1').
